item.title: 开源项目
item.description: daily-warm Send an email to someone you care about everyday, include weather, poem, an ONE word pixi-game A library makes Pixi.js using easily, like phase.js parcel-plugin-css-url-loader A plugin for parcel to convert css/less/scss images url into base64. pre-commit Git hook Check git merger conflict by default

item.title: 关于我
item.description: 苏夏天心 UI Developer @ThoughtWorks 博客记录一些学习的技术, 翻译的文章, 写的歌词, 以及生活中的一些尝试 主要技术栈 JavaScript & Typescript React.js & Vue.js Go
